availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Milton O. Robinson (Taylor County, Kentucky, farmer)

body.p: Taylor County, Kentucky, farmer. Virginia native. Married to Martha Ann Robinson. Father of Sophronia A. Robinson, William O. Robinson, John M Robinson, Margaret J. Robinson, Frank Luther Robinson, and Sally B. Robinson. Farmer in Taylor County in 1850. Farmer in Taylor County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor, Division 1, p. 190B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Taylor County, Division 2, p. 16.
Find A Grave, "Milton O. Robinson (May 6, 1817-November 2, 1884)," Memorial #104550329, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/104550329 (accessed April 23, 2018).
